item.title: November 17th, 2014 - this one needs to last three weeks
item.description: A musical carnival of sorts - New Wave, No Wave, Rogue Folk, Black Metal, oh my!
item.itunes:subtitle: A musical carnival of sorts - New Wave, No Wave, Rogue Folk, Black Metal, oh my!

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Nov-2014
item.description: Musings on punishment, metal from the deep south, space monsters, Thurston Moore and...
item.itunes:subtitle: Musings on punishment, metal from the deep south, space monsters, Thurston Moore and...

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Nov-2014
item.itunes:subtitle: By myself, buried deep in the den...

item.title: Crass Conversations
item.description: Katayoon (Other Jesus, Horses Records) and Spencer (Cowards) join me to promote the "Uncovered" Halloween show at Red Gate and their Crass cover band PENIS ENVY...Spooky tracks from The Fall, Lydia Lunch, Crass, The Ex, and more!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Katayoon (Other Jesus, Horses Records) and Spencer (Cowards) join me to promote the "Uncovered" Halloween show at Red Gate and their Crass cover band PENIS ENVY

item.title: Guest Host Adam from NEEDLES//PINS / POOR FORM
item.description: Adam stops by to play some great punk tracks from the early 90s and onwards
item.itunes:subtitle: Adam stops by to play some great punk tracks from the early 90s and onwards

item.title: Thanksgiving Day - October 13, 2014
item.description: Well, its lasted three weeks now... Episode 3 features new albums from Iceage and Pharmakon, a quick ode to Cowards, punk compilations from Vancouver and Brazil, and of course, The Fall
item.itunes:subtitle: New Iceage and Pharmakon, a quick ode to Cowards, punk compilations from Vancouver and Brazil, and of course, The Fall

item.title: Guest Hosts COSMETICS!
item.description: The Vancouver synth duo swing by to play some 7"s scrounged from around the world.
item.itunes:subtitle: October 6, 2014 - The Vancouver synth duo swing by to play some 7"s scrounged from around the world.

item.title: Debut episode of The Burrow - September 29, 2014
item.description: Alright, I guess it's official now. First episode features the new Shellac and Iceage, along with locals //zoo, Mutators, Failing, and others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hosted by Andy Resto
